title: Oleksii_Tacans
author: Oleksii_Tacans
content: The private family office of Lars Seier Christensen (about Lars, the main investor, info here https://www.seiercapital.com/about), chairman and founder of the Concordium Foundation, decided to allocate an investment pool of 10 million euros for projects utilizing the Concordium blockchain. Seier Capital is actively looking for investment opportunities in Ukrainian startups building blockchain products.There are many young entrepreneurs with great ideas about what blockchain technology can do in the future, and Seier Capital wants to expand its presence in these companies of the future. The new € 10 million allocation is intended to help new startups get started and accelerate by using the unique ecosystem and features of the blockchain network Concordium (https://concordium.com/). The money will be allocated both in the form of grants and in the form of investments in projects that decide to build Concordium networks on the blockchain.In addition to investments in start-ups, full technical expertise and support from the Swiss/Ukrainian blockchain Venture builder, Tacans, who’s CEO, Mathias Lundoe Nielsen, will be directly mentoring the startups receiving funding (there is information about the main products of the company in the presentation).Seier Capital already has a large portfolio of investments (the portfolio is in the presentation). Such steps from foreign investors make it clear that from abroad they are looking very closely and attentively at Ukrainian projects even during the war.Link to apply for a grant - https://www.seiercapital.com/investment
